The CO2-emissions of your supply chain have great impact on the world and its environment. With Flexport's newest tool, you can get more insights in the type of carriers and their CO2 emissions. 
It will help you analalyze, calculate and imrove your carbon-footprint. Flexport's Emission Calculator will help you in your way to becoming a 100% emission-free company!
